'''Royce''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in [[Bennett]]'s [[Hangout Event]], Act I: [[Fantastic Voyage (Hangout Event)|Fantastic Voyage]].

He is a former member of [[Benny's Adventure Team]].

Royce has short brown hair. He wears the standard male uniform of the Adventurers' Guild.
